page.title: 07Local News
page.content: There are 2 local news letters. One is "The Cromhall News Letter" printed by the village association. It is printed 3 times a year. It includes topics such as "The Rector writes", lost property, gardening tips, recipes, local history, clubs and dates. Recent articles have mentioned the extention to the school, protest at heavy traffic through the village, proposed bus cuts and cleaning out the pond. The other news letter is "Cromhall, Tortworth and Tytherington News" which is the church news letter. In the July 1985 edition the Rector wrote about the problem of dumping of rubbish and litter in the village.
